p: Categorical data were analyzed with Ï‡ 2 test and Fischer exact test, and continuous variables with independent t test, or 1-way ANOVA. A multivariate logistic regression analysis was used to assess the potential impact of variables on clinical severity, with bootstrapping to obtain confidence intervals. A P value of <.05 was considered statistically significant for the comparisons. Statistical Program for Social Science release 11 was used for all statistical calculations.
